para.programlisting:
import module namespace stack = "http://zorba.io/modules/stack";
variable $stName := fn:QName("", "stack1"); ( stack:create($stName), stack:size($stName), stack:push($stName, <a/>), stack:top($stName), stack:size($stName), stack:pop($stName), stack:top($stName), stack:size($stName) )
